James 'Griff' Griffiths

Executive Creative Director I BRING - Universal Music for Brands.

Griff is an award winning, globally recognised creator of brand moments that transcend traditional forms of media to become part of popular culture. He believes that brands that don’t create passionate tribes are ultimately going to fade away. Therefore, he is on a personal mission to consistently push clients to challenge the ways in which they think to create authentic moments that connect and catch fire.

He has worked closely with some of the world’s biggest brands including American Express, Myer, Optus, Samsung, adidas & KFC and is passionate about using creativity as a springboard to drive tangible & measurable outcomes for his brand partners.
